title: An introduction to Post-modernism (STUDENT SPECIAL)
description: In this episode. Matthew talks to Drew Dalton from The university of Sunderland all about Post-modernism. Drew explains the difference between modernity, liquid modernity and post-modernity as well as explaining ideas from the likes of Bauman, Foucault and Baudrillard.
itunes:author: Matthew Wilkin
